pages.text: $(l)Stats$()$(li)Price: :coin: 4,096$(li)Forage: Fine Wool (50% chance), Rabbit's Foot (16% chance)$(li)Drops: Raw Rabbit, Rabbit Hide$(br2)$(l)Notes$()$(br)Foraging Fine Wool requires 3+ hearts & Rabbit's Foot requires 7+.
They hate being pet, but if they like you enough they'll give you their excess feet... Somehow...
